headline.main: NC Governor, Legislature Head to Court in Power Showdown
headline.print_headline: NC Governor, Legislature Head to Court in Power Showdown

lead_paragraph: North Carolina's new Democratic governor and majority Republican legislature are charging at each other in a constitutional game of chicken over their powers, a confrontation that could shape the recent conservative direction of state policies and spending.
